resources.string: One of the most important symbols of Torun
A medieval defensive Tower with a considerable tilt
One of the largest brick buildings of that kind in Europe
A medieval burgher\'s house belonged to Copernicus family
Among the oldest structures of that kind. Its construstion began in mid 13th century
Built in 1432, initially it was called the Crossing Gate or Ferry Gate
The Gothic Cathedral of St. John the Baptist and St. John the Evangelist
It is a place where the history has the smell and the taste of gingerbread adventure
Also called the Holy Spirit Gate, erected as one of four gates leading into Torun
Late-Baroque edifice raised in mid-18th century as an Evangelical church
Boutique hotel where the building combines modern décor with history of renovated 13th century Old Mill
The historical building Koszary Racławickie, today\'s Hotel Bulwar, was constructed 1819–1822 as military barracks
A modern and comfortably equipped object - top choice for family vacation, company meetings
Situated in the city center, close to the old town and the birthplace of Nicolaus Copernicus
An outstanding venue for conferences, business meetings and private celebrations
The charm of a over hundredyearold building with all the modern conveniences of a contemporary apartment
In the heart of the city centre with a restaurant that you must try out
A really cosy and romantic place. We make sure that you feel totally at home
A perfect place to stay longer in Toruń and spend your spare time actively
Italian food with bread baked every day from their own recipe traditional way
Here you will be able to see the beer creation process with your own eyes and taste the beverage straight from the tank
Uniqe and modern place where you can eat delicious food in a nice family atmosphere
Best pancakes in the city with all kinds of fillings. Manekin is more than just food, it\'s a lifestyle
Traditioal pierogi prepared on the spot. Unique interiors and home-like taste
A recognized confectionery company with great coffee and delicious cakes
This milk bar is a perfect place to eat good cheap food from polish cuisine
One of three places in the city where you can taste a whole range of craft, unique and seasonal beers
The programme of this event is based on three pillars: Science, Art, People. All with great illuminations to be watched at night
The very first festival in Poland entirely devoted to the presentation of short films
Fantasy Festival, which is visited by fans from all over Poland, is the largest convention in the region and has been taking place in the city since 2010
An obligatory festival for fans of blues and all its mergers
The festival Concerts under the Stars consists of several concerts that take place on summer evenings, also outdoors
Meetings with known artists, concerts of a very diverse nature and performance, also spectacles
Several theaters from different corners of Europe meet to show performances whose main aspect is animation
International Film Festival with productions awarded in Berlin, Cannes or Locarno and promising debuts
